title: Marketplace Roundtable #26: Picks For The Late Stage Of The Bull Cycle W/Andres Cardenal)
description: As the bull market stretches out another leg, Andres Cardenal, CFA highlights a few areas where value is still to be found. The author of The Data-Driven Investor, he combines a quantitative and fundamental analysis approach to his investing. In the current climate, he likes the market's outlook over the next 6-12 months as well specific ideas in U.S. tech such as Google, and opportunities abroad as in Brazil.
itunes:title: Picks For The Late Stage Of The Bull Cycle W/Andres Cardenal)
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A combo of quantitative and fundamental analysis highlights some interesting stock ideas.
